# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)
project(anidl LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_executable(anidl "")
set_target_properties(anidl PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "anidl")
set_target_properties(anidl PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "build/macosx/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(anidl PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:x86_64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:x86_64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(anidl PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(anidl PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(anidl PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
target_link_libraries(anidl PRIVATE
    z
)
target_sources(anidl PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
